name: Jules Verne's Adventures
description:
Submission for Godot Wild Jam #27

The book is often better than the movie, but the game is most certainly better than the book!

Around the world does not include a hot air balloon. The character in the journey to the centre of the word never reaches the centre. And from the earth to the moon is not about the moon at all! We can do better!

How to play

Using the arrows and the space bar you can play each minigame. Enjoy the game!
